subject: Hockey, Ice
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: Lindy Ruff spent half of his life working for the Buffalo Sabres, as a player for 10 years and a coach for 16. His firing was not unexpected, but his dismissal has left fans, and Ruff, numb.
snippet: Lindy Ruff spent half of his life working for the Buffalo Sabres, as a player for 10 years and a coach for 16. His firing was not unexpected, but his dismissal has left fans, and Ruff, numb.
